command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 26YcRyEmMHMZfUu.adf0f9e7dfe8 --database HZ2NtaFJFkAENvPvciWDsB --execute 
-- Add 3-Month Bundle (180 capsules)
INSERT INTO productVariants (productId, name, sku, priceInCents, compareAtPriceInCents, stockQuantity, isActive, sortOrder)
SELECT id, '3-Month Supply (180 Capsules)', 'OPTIBIO-ASH-180', 12700, 14997, 500, 1, 2
FROM products WHERE slug = 'ashwagandha-ksm-66' LIMIT 1;

-- Add 6-Month Bundle (360 capsules)
INSERT INTO productVariants (productId, name, sku, priceInCents, compareAtPriceInCents, stockQuantity, isActive, sortOrder)
SELECT id, '6-Month Supply (360 Capsules)', 'OPTIBIO-ASH-360', 23999, 29994, 300, 1, 3
FROM products WHERE slug = 'ashwagandha-ksm-66' LIMIT 1;

-- Verify bundles were added
SELECT id, name, sku, priceInCents, compareAtPriceInCents, stockQuantity FROM productVariants WHERE sku IN ('OPTIBIO-ASH-180', 'OPTIBIO-ASH-360');
logs: ERROR 1062 (23000) at line 3: Duplicate entry '?' for key 'productVariants.productVariants_sku_unique'
